title: Add message timestamps, read receipts, theme toggle, and professional design improvements

requirements.text: Display the timestamp showing when each chat message was sent in both AdminChatPanel and ChatWidget components

quotes: Coloque o hor√°rio onde as mensagens do chat foram enviadas

acceptanceCriteria: Each message in the chat displays a timestamp indicating when it was sent
Timestamps are formatted in a user-friendly way (e.g., 'HH:MM' or relative time)
Timestamps are visible in both the admin chat panel and client chat widget

requirements.text: Add visual indicators (symbols/icons) to show message status: sent or read

quotes: o simbolo de mensagem enviada ou lida

acceptanceCriteria: Messages display a checkmark or similar symbol to indicate sent status
Messages display a double checkmark or different symbol to indicate read status
Status indicators are visible and distinguish between sent and read states

requirements.text: Implement a light/dark theme toggle that allows users to switch between light and dark modes

quotes: coloque o tema claro ou escuro

acceptanceCriteria: A theme toggle control is accessible to users in the dashboard
Switching themes updates the entire interface color scheme instantly
Both light and dark themes are fully styled and usable

requirements.text: Enhance the dashboard design to achieve a more professional appearance with improved typography, spacing, visual hierarchy, and consistent styling across all components

quotes: deixe mais profissional o design do painel

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard layout uses improved spacing and alignment for a cleaner look
Typography is refined with better font weights, sizes, and hierarchy
Visual elements follow a consistent design system with cohesive colors and styling
Overall interface appears more polished and professional

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo actor structure or data models
Preserve all existing functionality while adding new features
Maintain compatibility with current authentication system
nonGoals: Backend changes to message storage or data models
Complete redesign of existing component structure
